title: 'Not worth the money'
body: The watch is good in looks but I faced many software related issues within couple of months of use. Then a month I got it replaced and in return got a damaged product.my watch is still in the service center and I have no idea if I'm ever going to get a good product.

title: 'Bring life to your foodü•≤'
body: The media could not be loaded. I tested on bottle ( previously fireboltt watch found heartbeat in that bottle ) but it rejected. So I took a guava, and tested it. And surprisingly maybe it's weaker than firebolt, but it found heart beat in that guava. Now I'm trying to save the life of guava from drying. Jokes aside, don't buy cheap smart watches, these worth just waste of money.
